Job Title: Marketing Coordinator

Location: New York City Metropolitan Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Advertising, Marketing

Description:
For almost 130 years, Abel & Schafer has been producing baked goods in Europe under the KOMPLET brand name. In 1982 the company established a manufacturing facility in Ronkonkoma, NY to serve the fast-growing markets of the United States, Canada, Mexico, Central/South America, and the Caribbean. To support our continuous growth in these markets, we are currently recruiting Marketing Coordinator.This position as a Marketing Coordinator is a hybrid position responsible for providing support to the general management, sales, and marketing departments. Will handle a variety of duties that are critical to the nature of the business while conducting oneself with a high degree of professionalism and sound judgment. We are looking for someone that is loyal and thrives within a creative, fast paced environment. Must be able to quickly adapt to change and is able to keep the success and forward movement of the business as the ultimate top priority.Main DutiesPreparing brochures and presentation materials. Facilitate communication with all team members involved.Assist with the preparation of formal letters to clients and prepare client contracts.Facilitate communication with the team members involved.Design and prepare PowerPoint presentations for meetings.Planning in-house events, and client events including research, planning, invitations, arrangements and journal ad creation.Support web site upgrades and redesignSupport marketing initiatives such as mail blasts, press releases and/or publicationsAssist with lead generation activities as required (project opportunity searches)Maintain social media presence on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn etc.Assist in updating and maintaining company marketing collateral and brandingAssist and support in the preparation of, customization of and re-design of brochures.Assisting / supporting Regional Key Account ManagersInformation and communication activitiesMaintain an open and sincere communication both internally and externally with A&S management, A&S colleagues, customers and potential customers.Provide timely information about current and future activities on an on-going basisPrepare quarterly reports to sales management.Provide competitive and marketplace feedback to sales and product management.RequirementsBachelor’s Degree in Marketing, Advertising, or related field5+ years’ experience working in marketing / advertisingBi Lingual Spanish speaking language skills desired Ability to multi-task effectively in a fast-paced environmentExcellent problem-solving skillsMust be willing to travel to offsite training sessionsStrong communication and organizational skillsUnderstanding of marketing and sales fundamentals including product positioning, pricing, market research, and distribution preferred but not required.

Experience Level (if available): Associate
